uk.co.crider.jablus

Interface SimulationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Simulation

    public interface SimulationInterface
    Defines funtions available to any simluation user interface. No user interface should reference a Simulation object directly. All user interfaces should implement the UserInterface interface
    See Also:
    UserInterface

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean atCurrentState()
      Whether the state history browser is at the last executed state
